meanings.definition: To have an influence that is contrary to or against another influence.
meanings.sent1: Her positive attitude counterinfluenced his negative outlook.
meanings.sent2: The new research findings counterinfluenced the previous conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy counterinfluenced the grumpy cat to join in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected turn of events counterinfluenced the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent5: The colorful artwork counterinfluenced the mood of the room.

meanings.definition: To be influenced in a way that opposes or contradicts another influence.
meanings.sent1: Despite his efforts, he was counterinfluenced by his friends' opinions.
meanings.sent2: She felt counterinfluenced by the conflicting advice she received.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn child was counterinfluenced by the gentle persuasion of his teacher.
meanings.sent4: The loud music counterinfluenced her ability to concentrate on her work.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected compliment counterinfluenced her mood for the rest of the day.
